Lunarpines nose wasn't wrong, it was Strikers scent he smelled, he 
just had to talk to him, Lunarpine followed the scent to Strikers 
location. (Is Striker inside or outside the Ark?)



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker ::
> 
> Striker looks at Ratchet, nodding. "Allright. Do you think we 
should repair 
> this one or melt it down or start over?"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Prowl reluctantly turns away from Iron Raptor to look at Arcangel, 
his eyes 
> lighting up.
> 
> "That's brilliant!" the feathered Maximal exclaims (thanx for that 
nick-name, 
> Carnage), "We could put repair drones to work on it untill there 
are no bots 
> on the planet, then program it to crash into its spot!"
> 
> Prowl frowns. "But does Brooder have enough resources to put a ship 
that size 
> into space?"
